name: Down to the Wire
description:
Jim was just surfing the web, investing into doge coin, when the lithium gods struck down his battery life, and must rush to the only power outlet in the house before his phone dies, along with his doge coin.

Created in one week in participation of BTP Game Jam #3 under the theme Less is More. As Jim's battery depletes, he gains more speed.

CONTROLS:

W = Jump

Spacebar = Kick

A = Brake

Created By:

Kyle Walker - Programming

Alexis Walker - Art/Music

Ethan Bristowe - Designer and Cheerleader
